verses.verse: <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> that anything be written <S%G1125>to<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G199>well<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3779><s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they are <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G803>safety,<s%>" <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G160>sudden<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> will <S%G2186>come<s%> on <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> birth <S%G5604>pains<s%> <S%G3588>on<s%> <S%G1722>a<s%> <S%G1064>pregnant<s%> <S%G2192>woman;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1628>will<s%> in <S%G3361>no<s%> way <S%G3756>escape.<s%>

<S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G2250>day.<s%> <S%G2070>We<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> belong to the <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> to <S%G4655>darkness,<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2518>those<s%> who <S%G2518>sleep,<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%> in the <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3184>those<s%> who are <S%G3182>drunk<s%> are <S%G3184>drunk<s%> in the <S%G3571>night.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3525>let<s%> <S%G2249>us,<s%> since we <S%G5607>belong<s%> to the <S%G2250>day,<s%> be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> putting <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> for a <S%G4030>helmet,<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G2065>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> to <S%G1492>know<s%> those who <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G4291>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%>

<S%G3708>See<s%> that no <S%G3361>one<s%> <S%G591>returns<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> to <S%G5100>anyone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> after that which is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G1519>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5100>all.<s%>
<S%G1381>Test<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> and hold <S%G2722>firmly<s%> that which is <S%G2570>good.<s%>

I solemnly <S%G3726>command<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G314>that<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> be <S%G314>read<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>
